Audio.Locality: KM748, Troncal 10, Sierra de Lema, Bolívar
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 7m. Different individual to XC122852. Five song phrases (cut short by approaching traffic noise) from 30+ minutes of continuous song, countersinging with another c.50m away. As sometimes heard in M. campanisoma, the final song phrase has one ‘flat’ or ‘hoarse’ note. Sang from near-isolated bush overlying marshy area at edge of forest.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
